Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Phira jadom uha age vadhe tam musa ne apane celi'am nu kiha ki sadi roti li'a'o. Sadi isa yatara nala sanu bahuta thakavata ho ga'i hai

Celi'am ne kiha ki tusim dekhi'a, jadom asim usa pathara de pasa ruke si tam mai' machi bhula gi'a ate mainu saitana ne bhula dita. Ki maim usa di caraca karada ate machi hairanijanaka dhaga nala nikala ke nadi vica cali ga'i
Musa ne akhi'a, ise mauke di sanu talasa si. Isa la'i dovem apane kadamam de nisana vekhade ho'e vapisa mura a'e
Tam unham ne sade adami'am vicom ika avami nu dekhi'a, jisa nu asim apane kolom rahimata bakhasi si ate jisa nu apane pasom ika gi'ana sikha'i'a si
Musa ne usa nu kiha, ki maim' tuhade nala rahi sakada ham tam ki tusim mainu usa gi'ana vica sikha vevo, jo tuhanu sikha'i'a gi'a hai
Usane kiha tusim mere nala dhiraja nala nahim rahi sakade
Ate tusim usa vasatu upara dhiraja kivem rakha sakade ho je tuhade gi'ana di simam tom kite bahara hai
Musa ne akhi'a, jekara alaha cahe tam tusim sainu dhiraja rakhana vala dekhauge. Ate maim tuhadi kise gala tom inakara nahim_karanga
Usa ne akhi'a ki jekara tusim mere nala calade ho tam mainu ko'i gala na puchana jadom' taka ki sai' khuda tuhade kaula usada zikara na karam

Phira dove cala pa'e. Ithom taka ki jadom uha dovem kisati upara savara ho'e tam usa bade ne kisati vica surakha kara dita. Musa ne kiha ki tusim isa kisati vica isa la'i surakha kita hai tam ki uha kisati vali'am nu doba deve. Iha tam tusim bahuta sakhata kama kara dita
Usa ne kiha maim' tuhanu nahim kiha si ki tusim mere nala dhiraja nahim rakha sakonge
Musa ne kiha, meri galati te mainu na pharom. Mere mamale vica sakhati tom kama na lavo

Phira uha dovem cala pa'e. Ithom taka ki uha ika larake nu mile tam usa bade ne usa nu mara dita. Tam musa ne akhi'a ki tusim ika bekasura jana nu mara dita hai, halanki usa bade ne kise da khuna nahim kita si. Tusim bara mara kama kita hai
